Welcome.title: We Are Waiting For You
Welcome.description: At InOne Hotels, we're here to offer you a unique holiday experience.

Featured.title: INONE HOTELS
Featured.description: Experience the magnificence of the Inone hotel chain, an oasis on the Mediterranean coast that elevates luxury with its 'Ultra All Inclusive' services.

Contact.title: CONTACT US
Contact.description: Reach us by phone or email, or through the chat in the bottom right corner. Click 'Call You Back' option for a callback.
Contact.locationDescription: Discover the beauties of Bodrum, one of Turkey's and even the world's premier holiday destinations with its crystal clear bays and historical texture.

inoneBitez.heroSubtitle: A unique experience where luxury and tranquility meet in the incomparable beauty of the Mediterranean
inoneBitez.aboutDescription1: Located in Bitez, one of Bodrum's most prestigious bays, our hotel harmoniously blends modern luxury with the timeless beauty of the Mediterranean. In this unique location surrounded by crystal-clear waters, we create unforgettable memories for our guests.
inoneBitez.aboutDescription2: With every carefully designed detail, you will experience a holiday in harmony with nature. We take pride in offering accommodation that exceeds your expectations with our professional team and premium service approach.
inoneBitez.feature1Description: Exclusive beach area for our guests only, with crystal-clear Mediterranean waters at your doorstep
inoneBitez.feature2Description: Special menus where world cuisine meets local Bodrum flavors with exquisite tastes
inoneBitez.feature3Description: Complete renewal experience with modern spa facilities and holistic wellness programs
inoneBitez.feature4Description: Active holiday program filled with water sports, yoga sessions, and special events
inoneBitez.roomsDescription: Experience the pinnacle of comfort in modern rooms and suites designed in the peaceful atmosphere of Bitez
inoneBitez.room1Description: Spacious rooms with modern design and elegant details, meeting all your comfort needs for a perfect stay.
inoneBitez.room2Description: Our premium suites with spacious living areas and separate seating corners, offering a luxurious comfort experience.
inoneBitez.locationDescription: We are located in Bitez, one of the most beautiful bays of the Bodrum peninsula, in a peaceful yet central location. Just 15 minutes from Bodrum city center and a comfortable 45-minute journey to the airport.

bitezRooms.pageDescription: Experience an unforgettable accommodation in our rooms where modern comfort meets the unique beauty of the Mediterranean
bitezRooms.deluxeRoomDescription: Our deluxe rooms, featuring spacious and airy design, offer a luxurious accommodation experience with panoramic sea views. Experience the pinnacle of comfort with premium amenities and elegant decor.
bitezRooms.suiteRoomDescription: Experience a special accommodation with spacious living areas and VIP amenities in our suite rooms, the perfect combination of luxury and comfort. Create unforgettable memories with panoramic sea views.
bitezRooms.servicesDescription: Experience an unforgettable stay with our premium services designed to make your accommodation even more special
bitezRooms.beachServiceDescription: Sunbeds, umbrellas and beach services in our private beach area
bitezRooms.roomServiceDescription: 24/7 room service with delicious meals anytime you want
bitezRooms.housekeepingDescription: Daily cleaning and special housekeeping services
bitezRooms.contactDescription: Contact us to get detailed information about our rooms and make a reservation

deluxeRoomDetail.heroDescription: Experience an unforgettable accommodation in our Deluxe Room, offering the perfect harmony of luxury and comfort with panoramic sea views.
deluxeRoomDetail.roomDescription: Our 35 m² Deluxe Room offers the opportunity to watch the mesmerizing view of the Mediterranean from its private balcony. Experience the pinnacle of comfort with its modern design, premium amenities and elegant decor. Enjoy a luxurious vacation with jacuzzi bathroom, smart TV system and special mini bar options.
deluxeRoomDetail.beachServiceDescription: Sunbeds, umbrellas and beach services in private beach area
deluxeRoomDetail.conciergeServiceDescription: Professional support for your special requests
deluxeRoomDetail.reservationDescription: Make a reservation now to spend an unforgettable vacation in our Deluxe Room. We are waiting for you with the best price guarantee.

suiteRoomDetail.heroDescription: Experience a special accommodation with spacious living areas and VIP amenities in our Suite Room, the perfect combination of luxury and comfort.
suiteRoomDetail.roomDescription: Our 55 m² Suite Room offers spacious living areas with separate bedroom and living room. Experience an unforgettable vacation with jacuzzi private bathroom, panoramic Mediterranean views from the large private terrace and VIP amenities. Discover the pinnacle of luxury with modern sound system and premium services.
suiteRoomDetail.beachServiceDescription: VIP sunbeds, private service and premium beach services in private beach area
suiteRoomDetail.roomServiceDescription: 24/7 premium room service with exquisite flavors from special menus
suiteRoomDetail.conciergeServiceDescription: 24/7 professional support for your special requests with personal concierge
suiteRoomDetail.reservationDescription: Make a reservation now to spend a VIP vacation in our Suite Room. We are waiting for you with special discounts and best price guarantee.

aboutUs.heroDescription: In the heart of the Mediterranean, we take pride in offering unforgettable experiences to our guests in the unique beauty of Bitez
aboutUs.storyDescription1: Inone Bitez is a boutique hotel located in Bitez, one of Bodrum's most beautiful bays, offering the perfect harmony of nature's enchanting beauty with modern luxury. We were established to create unforgettable memories for our guests at our location right on the turquoise waters of the Mediterranean.
aboutUs.storyDescription2: Our hotel, which contains care in every detail, combines traditional Turkish hospitality with contemporary comfort understanding, offering our guests a unique holiday experience. With our sustainability principles and environmentally friendly approach, we always prioritize the importance of preserving natural beauties.
aboutUs.valuesDescription: The core values we embrace to provide the best service to our guests
aboutUs.excellenceDescription: We provide service beyond expectations by aiming for excellence in every detail
aboutUs.hospitalityDescription: We blend traditional Turkish hospitality with modern understanding
aboutUs.sustainabilityDescription: We pass natural beauties to future generations with environmentally friendly practices
aboutUs.luxuryDescription: We bring together comfort and elegance to experience the true meaning of luxury
aboutUs.locationDescription1: Our facility is located in Bitez, one of the most beautiful bays of the Bodrum peninsula, in a peaceful yet central location. With our position on Atatürk Boulevard, we offer Bitez's natural beauty and our proximity to the sea together.
aboutUs.locationDescription2: Just 15 minutes from Bodrum city center and a comfortable 45-minute journey to Bodrum-Milas Airport. We provide easy access to surrounding ancient cities, marina, shopping centers, and entertainment venues.
aboutUs.teamDescription: Our experienced team working passionately to provide the best service to our guests

HotelsInfo.title: OUR HOTEL
HotelsInfo.subtitle: A unique experience in Bodrum. Unforgettable memories and peaceful moments await you.
HotelsInfo.muchoDescription: Located in one of Bodrum's most peaceful bays, Inone Hotel is an ideal choice for guests seeking a tranquil vacation in harmony with nature. You will find peace in this special place where modern comfort meets traditional Aegean hospitality.
HotelsInfo.muchoFeatures: Peaceful atmosphere, Private beach access, Spa & wellness center, Organic garden, Local flavors, Personal service
HotelsInfo.bitezDescription: Overlooking the turquoise waters of the Aegean, located in Bodrum's enchanting landscape, Inone Hotel offers the perfect harmony of luxury and comfort. Every detail designed with a boutique hotel concept provides our guests with a special and unforgettable vacation experience.
HotelsInfo.bitezFeatures: Sea view rooms, Gourmet restaurant, Spa & wellness center, Private beach, Concierge services, Premium activities

Gallery.title: GALLERY

honeymoon.title: Honeymoon Package
honeymoon.description: Create unforgettable memories with our romantic honeymoon package

hotel.title: About Hotel
hotel.description1: Experience an unforgettable holiday experience in our hotel with magnificent sea views. In our facility where modern comfort meets traditional hospitality, every detail is designed for your comfort.
hotel.description2: We offer you a perfect holiday with our spa center, open pool complex and private beach. Rest in our comfortable rooms and enjoy our delicious meals.

plane.subtitle: Make flight reservations at the most affordable prices with reliable airline partners.
plane.bottomText: You can safely make all your reservation transactions and find the most suitable flight options for you. Easily realize your travel plans with instant price updates and an easy booking system.
